item.title: Hacktoberfest 2020 Report | Lessons learned as Maintainer
item.description: This post have been published first on dev.to. as Creator Project ideas come from everywhere, don’t limit yourself and create a public repository even when you may be the only user. Don’t be perfect from the start, you can improve your project during its lifetime. You can choose any name for your project, sometimes a descriptive name, sometimes a play of words.
